snippet: Ronnie O’Sullivan equaled a record when he rolled in the 775th century break of his career at the Masters in London. He matched the mark of the retired Stephen Hendry.
lead_paragraph: Ronnie O’Sullivan equaled a record when he rolled in the 775th century break of his career at the Masters in London. He matched the mark of the retired Stephen Hendry.

headline.main: Record for Century Breaks Is Tied
headline.print_headline: Record for Century Breaks Is Tied
